fbx_not_found: Original FBX Not Found. Please reimport it.
fbx_unknown: Unknown or edited FBX file. If the vertex order is inconsistent, issues may occur when adding blendshapes.
drag_here: Drag your Avatar GameObject or Prefab here
ft_exist:
It appears that there is already an existing Face Tracking Addon.
 Please ensure that you delete the old addon before adding the new one.
memory_cost: Current Avatar Parameter Memory Cost: {0} bits
synced_limit: You have exceeded the limit for synced parameters in VRChat: {0} > 256 bits
ft_make_new: Apply Face Tracking as new Avatar
blueprint_warning: Warning: Blueprint ID Already Exists. Attempting to delete OSC config during upload. If sync issues arise, please reset the OSC config in VRChat or upload your avatar with a new Blueprint ID to ensure proper functionality of VRCFT.
